overview: Ken serves at Dotomiâ€™s Chief Marketing and Operating Officer where he manages the product marketing, development, studio and operations functions. With more than 20 years of Interactive Marketing experience, Ken Treske helps guide the company through the increasingly rapid pace of product and interactive marketing innovation. Prior to Dotomi, Ken served as the President of Vente, an Experian business unit. During his 2-year tenure, Ken introduced new automation and led the innovation of new one-to-one business products leading to double digit growth for the company. Ken also served as the Chief Marketing Officer at CoolSavings Inc., where he led the marketing, product and analytics teams and established one of the first and fastest growing online lead generation networks.
